system.description: A flexible container made of leather or a preserved animal bladder, with a capacity of two quarts. When filled, it has an encumbrance of 30 coins; when empty, 5 coins. A normal-sized person drinks about 2qts of water per day.
system.unidentifiedDesc: A flexible container made of leather or a preserved animal bladder, with a capacity of two quarts. When filled, it has an encumbrance of 30 coins; when empty, 5 coins. A normal-sized person drinks about 2qts of water per day.
